name: A Crazy Skater Boy - Adventure In The Big City Skate Park Games
name_original: A Crazy Skater Boy - Adventure In The Big City Skate Park Games
description:
** 100% FREE! EVERYTHING UNLOCKED! **

You're a little skater boy exploring a new skate park for the first time. Run, jump, and avoid several obstacles as you make your way around.

FEATURES

- Cute, adorable characters!
- Everything unlocked. Nothing to buy!
- Simple controls. Just "tap" to jump!
- Original Soundtrack.
- Fun for the whole family! Even grandma will love this!
